experience.title: Test lead
responsibilities: Create test plan, sprint report for each sprint
Test API, mobile, web (iOS, Android, Chrome)
Review product requirement, UI/UX
Creating and reviewing test documents (test case, test report, bug)
Control task, issue, effort for each member
Discuss with customer, partners about business, issue…
Raising as well as solving whenever a problem occurs
Suggest solutions, ideas for PO/BA to resolve issues about product
Summarizing and reporting to PM and test manager about working status, testing progress, test result, issue for each sprint
Feature: General trader lending, CASA linking, Wallet, Check out, Group fund, Money transfer

experience.title: Test lead
responsibilities: Planning and implementing test activities with different test target
Managing and monitoring a testing team with 5 members
Analyzing requirement, creating and reviewing test documents such as: test policy, test design, test case, test report, bug report
Summarizing and reporting to customer as well as higher leader about working status, testing progress, test result, issue, etc.
Raising as well as solving whenever a problem occur
Develop requirement (create test viewpoint, function list, test design, test case and checklist)
Manage test document, configuration (Network, server, broadcast environment)
Review test reports, bug lists and log bugs
Support members when they met issues and find the
Communicate, discussing with customer about bug, issue or Q&A about requirement
Product: Smart TV (Android OS)

experience.title: Sub-lead
responsibilities: Develop requirement for new mobile app (create test design, check list and test case)
Review test report
Control execute test progress of test team
Communicate, discussing with customer, dev team about bug, issue, improve requirement…
Product: Mobile app

experience.title: Test member
responsibilities: Develop document for new mobile app (create test design, check list and test case)
Execute test
Product: Smart TV
